quote: Bring out with you all the living creatures of every sort of flesh, of the flying creatures and of the animals and of all the creeping animals of the earth, that they may multiply on the earth and be fruitful and become many on the earth.”
And it was the heart’s desire of my father David to build a house for the name of Jehovah the God of Israel.
For there is nothing hidden that will not become manifest, nor anything carefully concealed that will never become known and not come out in the open.
